AT.name: Bravely Second™: End Layer Demo
AT.description: Diese Demo handelt in erster Linie von den Drei Kavalieren Yew Geneolgia, Janne Angard und Nikolai Nikolanikov. Sie gibt dem Spieler einen Vorgeschmack des Abenteuers und erlaubt es ihm je nach Spielfortschritt in der Demo sogar, in der Vollversion des Spiels Belohnungen freizuschalten. Bravely Second™: End Layer Demo "The Ballad of the Three Cavaliers" kann mehrmals durchgespielt werden, doch nur ein Spielstand, mit dem bis zum Ende gespielt wurde, kann dazu verwendet werden, in der Vollversion Belohnungen freizuschalten.

AU.name: Bravely Second™: End Layer Demo
AU.description: This demo focusing on the Three Cavaliers – Yew Geneolgia, Janne Angard, and Nikolai Nikolanikov – will act as a prelude to the adventure, and even allow players to unlock rewards in the full version of the game, depending on their progress in the demo. The Bravely Second™: End Layer demo: The Ballad of the Three Cavaliers can be completed multiple times, however only a completed save file can be used to unlock rewards in the full game.

BG.name: Bravely Second™: End Layer Demo
BG.description: This demo focusing on the Three Cavaliers – Yew Geneolgia, Janne Angard, and Nikolai Nikolanikov – will act as a prelude to the adventure, and even allow players to unlock rewards in the full version of the game, depending on their progress in the demo. The Bravely Second™: End Layer demo: The Ballad of the Three Cavaliers can be completed multiple times, however only a completed save file can be used to unlock rewards in the full game.

BE.name: Bravely Second™: End Layer Démo
BE.description: Cette démo consacrée aux Trois Cavaliers (Yew Généolgia, Janne Angard et Nikolaï Nikolanikov) sera le prélude de l'aventure. Elle permet aux joueurs de débloquer des récompenses dans la version complète du jeu, selon leur progression dans la démo. La Démo de Bravely Second™ : End Layer: The Ballad of the Three Cavaliers, peut être terminée plusieurs fois, mais il vous faudra un fichier de sauvegarde de la démo terminée pour débloquer des récompenses dans la version complète du jeu.

ES.name: Bravely Second™: End Layer Demo
ES.description: Esta demo protagonizada por los tres paladines (Yew Geneolgia, Janne Angard y Nikolai Nikolanikov) servirá de preludio a la aventura y permitirá a los jugadores desbloquear recompensas en la versión completa del juego en función de su progreso en la demo. Bravely Second™: End Layer Demo, The Ballad of the Three Cavaliers se puede completar varias veces. Sin embargo, para desbloquear recompensas en la versión completa del juego, solo se podrá utilizar un archivo de guardado con la demo completada.

IT.name: Bravely Second™: End Layer Demo
IT.description: Questa demo che vede protagonisti i Tre cavalieri (Yew Geneolgia, Janne Angard e Nikolai Nikolanikov) è un preludio all'avventura principale e permette ai giocatori di sbloccare ricompense nella versione integrale del gioco, in base al loro progresso nella demo. Bravely Second™: End Layer Demo: The Ballad of the Three Cavaliers può essere completata più volte, ma verrà usato solo un file di salvataggio completo per sbloccare le ricompense nella versione integrale del gioco.

The Bravely Second™: End Layer demo: The Ballad of the Three Cavaliers can be completed multiple times, however only a completed save file can be used to unlock rewards in the full game.

NL.name: Bravely Second™: End Layer Demo
NL.description: Deze demo, waarin de Three Caveliers (drie ruiters) - Yew Geneolgia, Janne Angard, en Nikolai Nikolanikov - centraal staan, dient als een voorproefje voor het avontuur. Spelers kunnen zelfs beloningen in de volledige versie van het spel vrij spelen, afhankelijk van hun voortgang in de demo. De Bravely Second™: End Layer-Demo: The Ballad of the Three Cavaliers kan meerdere keren uitgespeeld worden, maar alleen een spel dat is opgeslagen wanneer je het hebt uitgespeeld kan gebruikt worden om beloningen vrij te spelen in het volledige spel.

NZ.name: Bravely Second™: End Layer Demo
NZ.description: This demo focusing on the Three Cavaliers – Yew Geneolgia, Janne Angard, and Nikolai Nikolanikov – will act as a prelude to the adventure, and even allow players to unlock rewards in the full version of the game, depending on their progress in the demo. The Bravely Second™: End Layer demo: The Ballad of the Three Cavaliers can be completed multiple times, however only a completed save file can be used to unlock rewards in the full game.

PL.name: Bravely Second™: End Layer Demo

The Bravely Second™: End Layer demo: The Ballad of the Three Cavaliers can be completed multiple times, however only a completed save file can be used to unlock rewards in the full game.

PT.name: Bravely Second™: End Layer Demo
PT.description: Esta demo centrada nos Three Cavaliers (três cavaleiros) - Yew Ganeolgia, Janne Angard e Nikolai Nikolanikov - funciona como um prelúdio da aventura principal e até permite aos jogadores desbloquear recompensas na versão completa do jogo, dependendo do seu progresso na demo. A demo Bravely Second™: End Layer, The Ballad of the Three Cavaliers pode ser completada múltiplas vezes, no entanto, só com os dados de gravação de um jogo completo conseguirás desbloquear recompensas no jogo principal.

RU.name: Bravely Second™: End Layer демоверсия
RU.description: В центре внимания этой демоверсии находятся три всадника: Yew Geneolgia, Janne Angard, and Nikolai Nikolanikov. Играя в эту демоверсию, которая служит вступлением к приключению, игроки смогут получать награды в полной версии игры, в зависимости от успешности прохождения. The Bravely Second™: End Layer demo: The Ballad of the Three Cavaliers можно пройти множество раз, но чтобы получить награды в полной версии игры, вам нужно использовать файл сохранения пройденной демоверсии.
